description: This is a React component representing a signup page in a Next.js application. The component handles user registration by taking email and password inputs, invoking Supabase authentication, and navigating to the dashboard upon success.

methods.name: SignupPage
methods.description: Functional React component for user signup form, handling form submission, validation, error display, and navigation.

methods.name: handleSignup
methods.description: Event handler for form submission, performs user registration via Supabase and navigates on success.
